item.title: Snap reactions to every Week 17 game: Broncos stay in control of AFC destiny; Cowboys, Vikings win
item.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer big questions from each Week 17 game. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: Kelce emotional after season finale at Arrowhead
item.description: The Chiefs' loss to the Broncos might have marked Travis Kelce's final appearance at Arrowhead Stadium, though the star tight end remained noncommitta...

item.title: Vikes dominate Lions despite woeful passing game
item.description: The Vikings accomplished the rare feat of winning an NFL game while finishing with fewer than 10 net passing yards.

item.title: Lions' playoff chances end with loss: 'It sucks'
item.description: The Lions officially fell out of playoff contention with a 23-10 loss to the Vikings, leaving Detroit to evaluate how it needs to improve.

item.title: Dak's 'pride' has him planning to play final game
item.description: Dak Prescott reiterated after Thursday's win that he wants to play in next week's season finale versus the Giants, citing his pride in not finishing b...
